kv4.5:1.3: Arahā chahi phassehi, chahi vedanāhi, chahi saññāhi …pe… chahi paññāhi samannāgatoti?
kv4.5:2.3: Arahā cakkhunā rūpaṁ passanto sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusati, manasā dhammaṁ vijānāti …pe…
kv4.5:2.4: manasā dhammaṁ vijānanto cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, sotena saddaṁ suṇāti, ghānena gandhaṁ ghāyati, jivhāya rasaṁ sāyati, kāyena phoṭṭhabbaṁ phusatīti?
kv4.5:3.3: Satataṁ samitaṁ abbokiṇṇaṁ chahi upekkhāhi samannāgato samohito, cha upekkhāyo paccupaṭṭhitāti?
kv4.5:4.6: Hañci arahā chaḷaṅgupekkho, tena vata re vattabbe—
